mapper.select: SELECT id, open_id as openId, name as name, mobile as mobile, birthday as birthday, province , city , zone , user_level as userLevel, addr , mail , card , account_money as accountMoney, reward_money as rewardMoney, back_money as backMoney, create_by as createBy, create_date as createDate, update_by as updateBy, update_date as updateDate, remarks, del_flag as delFlag, update_flag_name as updateFlagName, update_flag_card as updateFlagCard, user_type as userType, photo , min_photo as minPhoto, point, bank_type as bankType, bank_card as bankCard, parent_id as parentId FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id}
